snippet: The decision by Fox Television Studios not to be involved in producing a hotly debated mini-series for NBC was a financial decision, one executive said, and not a political one.
abstract: Fox Television Studios says it will not be involved with hotly debated Hillary Rodham Clinton miniseries on NBC; decision comes on same day as vote by Republican National Committee to ban any presidential debates in 2016 primary season from NBC because of proposed movie; Fox executive says decision was entirely financial decision.
lead_paragraph: The decision by Fox Television Studios not to be involved in producing a hotly debated mini-series for NBC was a financial decision, one executive said, and not a political one.

headline.main: Fox Decides Not to Produce Hillary Clinton Mini-Series
headline.print_headline: Fox Decides Not to Produce Hillary Clinton Mini-Series
